all_items: Based on the loaded documents, provide the table of all ordered items. Show them in table format with the following columns: Item, Invoice number, Ordered Quantity.
get_invoice_details: Show the invoice detail, provide details in table format with the following rows: Order Date, Document Identifier (as invoice number), Contact Person, Tax (as a VAT rate), Total Amount. If you dont have specific information, leave it blank.
chart: Get total amount values from attached invoices and present the data as pandas DataFrame, starts from data=.
get_date_details: Avoid the prompt template and prepare the dictionary that includes invoice number as a key and order date in format dd-MM-yyyy as a value
